rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural lighting and ventilation, featuring a central reception area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area adjacent to the entrance hall with large windows for ample natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Connected to the kitchen and living room; designed with Vastu-compliant layout for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with sufficient ventilation, natural light through skylights, and an adjoining pantry area.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Guest room ensuring privacy and comfort with Vastu principles in mind.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed for optimal natural light, ventilation, and a private balcony facing east.

rooms.name: Family Room / Home Office
rooms.description: Multipurpose room for family activities or working from home with natural lighting.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Guest)
rooms.description: Compact bathroom for guest use, designed in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
